channel.title: Cast Spell On Player
channel.description: ive edited wind strike..added castonplayer etc etc, and it has barrage qualities when i use it on an npc, it barrages players too i cant cast it on a player though, all it does is do a lame animation and hits a 0 EVERY TIME i.e. no cast
